001.comments: VISA 220 001 will be delivered with some online and some in-person components at the UBC Vancouver campus (adhering to physical distancing and health requirements). If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

002.comments: If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

003.comments: If registration for this class is blocked, then it is full and you should register on the corresponding waitlist. Students will be periodically moved from the waitlist into the class as seats become available, and notified of their registration via email.

01W.comments: VISA 220 01W is a waiting list for VISA 220 001. Students will be moved from the waiting list into the course, space permitting, in order of registration date.While we hope all interested students will obtain a seat in this class, please be aware that being in the waiting list does not guarantee you will obtain a seat in the class.

description: Development of skills in drawing including life drawing. Introduction to the development of personal style and concepts.
